description.value:
You vitalize and stimulate the target at a cellular level, giving it a temporary burst of energy that unfortunately takes an exhausting toll. The target gains the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Quickened] condition and can use the extra action to Stride or Strike. After that round ends, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Fatigued] until it can rest for 10 minutes.

Heightened (6th) You can target up to six creatures by using 2 actions to Cast this Spell.

target.value: Up to 6 willing living creatures that aren't fatigued or quickened
1 willing living creature that isn't fatigued or quickened
